methods.onFailureInternal:
Called when the source table produces an error

:param originalException: (java.lang.Throwable) - the original throwable that caused this error
:param sourceEntry: (io.deephaven.engine.table.TableListener.Entry) - the performance tracker entry that was active when the error occurred
methods.onUpdate:
Process notification of table changes.

:param added: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - rows added
:param removed: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - rows removed
:param modified: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - rows modified

text:
This class is used for Listeners that represent "leaf" nodes in the update propagation tree.

 It provides an optional retention cache, to prevent listeners from being garbage collected.

 For creating internally ticking table nodes, instead use BaseTable.ShiftObliviousListenerImpl
